item.title: My Post
item.description: Sample Post! Random Python code library(reticulate) virtualenv_create("blog") ## virtualenv: blog #reticulate::use_condaenv("py37") py_install("pandas", envname = "blog") ## Using virtual environment 'blog' ... py_install("matplotlib", envname = "blog") ## Using virtual environment 'blog' ... py_install("numpy", envname = "blog") ## Using virtual environment 'blog' ... py_install("seaborn", envname = "blog") ## Using virtual environment 'blog' ... use_virtualenv("blog") matplotlib <- import("matplotlib", convert = TRUE) matplotlib$use("Agg") import pandas as pd import numpy as np import seaborn as sns fmri = sns.
